title: FF Mark
content:
Hello there,

I'm designing a site with FF Mark as the main typeface. I'm in love with this typeface and I think it will work very good, but as you know it's not versatile for body text. For titles works great. Any recommendations you guys have for some pairings?

Thanks!
author: rodrigogalindez

comments.content: Subject matter? Weights of FF Mark you intend to use?
You might like Neology Deco. It is a traditional geometric face but with a two-storey /a and modest x-height, for improved readability.

riccard0 — would like to use thin, regular. Subject = it's a translation services startup.

Nick — very nice! Was looking to use Effra for body copy. Maybe it could match.
